"not ironic".
This category is reserved for instances that are clearly not ironic, or which lack context to be sure that they are ironic

"verbal irony by means of a polarity contrast".
This category is reserved for instances containing an evaluative expression whose polarity (positive, negative) is inverted between the literal and the intended evaluation

"situational irony".
This category is reserved for instances describing situational irony, or situations that fail to meet some expectations.

"other verbal irony".
This category is reserved for instances that show no polarity contrast between the literal and the intended evaluation, but are nevertheless ironic.
